source_caption_data.pre_caption: In this close-up shot, a single matchstick is positioned vertically in the center of the frame and in the foreground against a black background. The camera remains static and at the subject's level throughout. The match ignites, and a bright flame briefly expands to fill the frame before settling into a steady, teardrop-shaped flame that burns upwards from the centrally located match head. As the flame burns, the match head remains stationary in the center foreground. The flame eventually extinguishes, and a thin wisp of smoke rises vertically from the charred head in the center of the frame before dissipating, leaving the burnt matchstick in its original central position.
